Class PaperScissorsRock

  • java.lang.Object
    • MiniGame
      • PaperScissorsRock

  • public class PaperScissorsRock
extends MiniGame
    Instances of PaperScissorsRock represent a minigame that the player plays against villains. Each object represents one minigame. Instances are created when a villain chooses to play Paper Scissors Rock.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[] CHOICES
      The possible choices in a game of PaperScissorsRock.
      private java.lang.String herosChoice
      A string representation of what the hero associated with this game chose to play.
      private java.lang.String villainsChoice
      A string representation of what the villain associated with this game will play (paper, scissors, or rock).

    • Constructor Summary

      A constructor for PaperScissorsRock.

        public PaperScissorsRock(Hero hero,

    • Method Detail

      • updateVillainsChoice

        public void updateVillainsChoice()
        Randomly selects a new value for the villain's choice, out of Paper, Scissors and Rock.

      • generateVillainsChoice

        private java.lang.String generateVillainsChoice()
        Uses random numbers to select a random choice that the villain will play. Determined at the start of the game.
        Returns:
        A string representing the villain's choice of paper, scissors, or rock.

      • computeOutcome

        public java.lang.String computeOutcome()
        Given the hero and villain choices of paper, scissors, or rock, determines who won the game.
        Returns:
        A String representing the outcome of the game, from the hero's perspective. Could be "Win", "Draw", or "Loss"

      • revealNot

        public java.lang.String revealNot()
        Returns one of the choices that the villain did not make.
        Returns:
        A string reprenting a choice the villain did not make.

      • setHerosChoice

        public void setHerosChoice(java.lang.String choice)
        Setter method for herosChoice.
        Parameters:
        choice - The new value for herosChoice.

      • getVillainsChoice

        public java.lang.String getVillainsChoice()
        Getter method for villainsChoice.
        Returns:
        The value of villainsChoice.

      • getHerosChoice

        public java.lang.String getHerosChoice()
        Getter method for herosChoice.
        Returns:
        The value of herosChoice.
